summary: The diff implements removal of the romantic/friendship onboarding step, adds a safe default `RelationshipIntent.friendship` for new profiles while still sending required backend fields, and removes the “Looking For” section from the Profile page while preserving/sending the existing stored `relationshipIntent` on update. However, the diff also updates project/documentation summary files to describe multiple unrelated UI/routing/features that were not requested in this BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Documentation/project summary updates describing unrelated new routes and UI feature changes (e.g., deep-link-only /closest-connections route, BottomNav icon-first conversion, ComposeStatusPage audience selector changes, Notifications mark-all-read behavior, CirclePage navigation link).
hallucinated_features.reason: These features are not requested by REQ-52/REQ-53/REQ-54 (which are limited to removing the intent question from onboarding and profile UI while preserving backend-required fields). The diff evidence only shows these items being added/changed in summary files, not required by the BuildRequest.
